title: The Counselling approach
creator_credit: Phil Swerdlow and Concord Films Council
brief_description: Counselling plays an important part in helping a pregnant woman face an abortion. There is a need for the woman to discuss her reactions to the situation and the decisions she makes concerning this. The work of counsellors in this area is highlighted.
